data.text: “Tso nàklẽ, elabena wò kekeli do,
elabena kpɔ ɖa, viviti ado ɖe anyigba katã dzi,
Dukɔwo ava wò kekeli la gbɔ,
“Fɔ mo dzi, eye nàkpɔ nu siwo ƒo xlã wò.
Ekema àkpɔe, ahako alɔgbɔnu.
Kposɔwo ƒe ha axɔ wò anyigba dzi
Woakplɔ Kedar ƒe lãhawo aƒo ƒu vɛ na wò,
“Ame kawoe nye ema le dzodzom
Vavãe ƒukpowo le mɔ kpɔm nam.
“Amedzroviwo agbugbɔ wò gliwo aɖo,
Wò agbowo anɔ ʋuʋu ɖi ɖaa.
eya ta dukɔ alo fiaɖuƒe si agbe be yemasubɔ mi o la,
“Lebanon ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ava dziwò.
Ame siwo te wò ɖe to la,
“Togbɔ be wogble wò ɖi helé fu wò,
Àno dukɔwo ƒe notsi, eye àno fiawo ƒe no,
Matsɔ sika ana wò ɖe akɔbli teƒe,
Womagase ŋutasesẽ ŋkɔ le wò anyigba dzi,
Ɣe maganye wò akaɖi le ŋkeke me loo
Wò ɣe magaɖo to azɔ o,
Ekema wò amewo katã anye dzɔdzɔetɔwo,
Ame ʋɛ siwo le mia dome la azu akpe,
